name: Goblin Escape (Yair Mizrachi)
description:
You play as a knight that is allergic to goblins. Unfortunately, you happen to find yourself at a goblin party.

You must descend the floors, hoping that you'll reach an exit. However, each floor has more goblins than the last.

Try making it as far as you can without touching any goblins and dying.

But be careful the goblins walk weird.

move with w,s,a,d or with the arrows

stop the game with "Esc"

Yair Mizrachi - Coding: https://yair-mizrachi.itch.io/

José Granado - Art: https://lumagalaxy.itch.io/

Justin Smith - Sound: https://cor3-stuff.itch.io/
